content.text: Tholoth was a planet located within the Tholoth system of the Colonies.

Tholoth was inhabited by a Near-Human species known as Tholothians; they often wore distinctive Tholoth headdresses. Jedi Masters Adi Gallia and Stass Allie were both Tholothians, as well as Jedi Initiate Katooni.

elements.text: Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan
Star Wars: Mysteries of the Jedi
